gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 129, Pacers 124
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeat the Pacers, 129-124. Jayson Tatum led the way with 30 points, seven rebounds and seven assists, along with two blocks for the Celtics, while Jaylen Brown (25 points, six rebounds, two steals) and Derrick White (24 points, five assists, four 3PM) added a combined 49 points in the victory. Aaron Nesmith tallied 26 points, 12 rebounds and seven assists for the Pacers, while Pascal Siakam added 23 points and six rebounds in the losing effort. The Celtics improve to 37-11 on the season, while the Pacers fall to 27-21.
